title: Cloquet Man Found Dead in Deer Stand
content:
Indentified as 73-year-old Leland Carlson
The Carlton County Sheriff’s Office reports that on Monday, November 7, 2016 at approximately 10:18 a.m., a 911 call was received, reporting a man was found deceased.
Authorities responded to the scene, to find a 73-year-old male from Cloquet deceased in his deer stand, in Red Clover Township, from a gun-shot wound.
The man has been identified as Leland Gene Carlson.
The incident is still under investigation at this time, but no foul play is suspected.
